description.value:
This tiny sword has a blade of platinum set into a grip and pommel of copper and zinc.

This is used as the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.gfIaZRTD94jfWBCX]{Arcane Sword} spell, which cannot be cast unless this component is carried by the caster.

This component can be used for the casting of the Arcane Sword spell as many times as you like.
